page.title: 12DEPRIVATION 2
page.content: FUNDING FOR THIS WORK COMES FROM THE{ {URBAN AID PROGRAMME.}A {LINK-UP GROUP} HAS BEEN SET UP IN PLAINS WITH AN ELECTED LOCAL CO-ORDINATOR AND REPRESENTATIVES FROM VOLUNTARY ORGANISATIONS AND THE PROFESSIONAL AGENCIES SUCH AS HEALTH, SOCIAL WORK, CHILD GUIDANCE AND COMMUNITY EDUCATION AND IS CURRENTLY PREPARING ITS PLAN FOR SUBMISSION AND HOPEFULLY FUNDING WILL BE GRANTED FROM THE URBAN PROGRAMME. THE PLAN MAKES PROVISION FOR THE YOUTH AND THE ELDERLY OF THE VILLAGE, HEALTH, NURSERY EDUCATION, MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUPS, SINGLE PARENT FAMILIES, LATCH-KEY CHILDREN AND SERVICE TO THE UNEMPLOYED.
